channel.title: RCS - Install?
channel.description:
So I upload RCS1.5 to the public folder, now when I visit the website it's asking me to install RCS. So I started messing around, and downloaded MySQL, but now I'm stuck? So it's showing me this: [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/O3PtNM4.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
Anybody wanting to help me out, if needed over TV?
EDIT: nvm fixed it!
